name: Muerte en Vinagre
description:
The game is developed in Spanish. 

This is a collaboration between my Studio and Reckless Monster Studio. 

Muerte en Vinagre tells the story of Gary, a man that is obsessed with a videogame until the point to mix the reality with his favorite game. Now that he is trapped in this parallel reality, we need to help him to solve the mystery of the lady in the jar to set him free. Will you discover the truth?
